-- start request --

# xr.yaml
apiVersion: example.com/v1
kind: XS3Bucket
metadata:
  name: bucket-36f7e
spec:
  parameters:
    region: eu-west-1

# observed.yaml
# crossplane name: the-bucket
apiVersion: s3.aws.upbound.io/v1beta1
kind: Bucket
metadata:
  annotations:
    crossplane.io/composition-resource-name: my-bucket
  generateName: bucket-36f7e-
  labels:
    crossplane.io/composite: bucket-36f7e
  name: bucket-36f7e-bucket
  ownerReferences:
  - apiVersion: example.com/v1
    blockOwnerDeletion: true
    controller: true
    kind: XS3Bucket
    name: bucket-36f7e
    uid: ""
spec:
  forProvider:
    region: eu-west-1
status:
  atProvider:
    arn: arn:aws:something

# extra-resources.yaml
# key: foobar
apiVersion: apiextensions.crossplane.io/v1beta1
data:
  labels:
    bar: baz
    foo: bar
kind: EnvironmentConfig
labels:
  foo: bar
metadata: null
name: foo-bar
-- end request --
